All of this character's soulbound ascended and legendary gear has been converted to be account bound. Going forward, all ascended and legendary gear will be account bound.

Your PvP locker has been converted to use the new wardrobe system. To edit your new loadout, use the PvP build panel, accessed from the new quick-launch bar at the top of your screen while in a structured PvP map.
Finish PvP matches to advance your current reward track and obtain loot. Advance a track to the end for the final reward.

Contains 1 of each of these minis:
• Mini Toxic Warlock
• Mini Molten Berserker
• Mini Aetherblade Admiral

Each mini can be activated from your inventory to follow you around the world.
Combine these three minis in the Mystic Forge with the Mini Mai Trin from the Black Lion Chest to create a Mini Scarlet Briar.
Your pending outfit changes are not displayed because your outfit is toggled off.
This action will revert all your pending transmutation changes. Are you sure you wish to continue?
Undo the pending transmutation on this item.
Manage your armor, weapons, and other equipment.
Open the Black Lion Trading Post to purchase more transmutation charges.
Transmute your equipment to change its appearance.
Apply all pending equipment transmutations and dye changes.
Revert all pending equipment transmutations and dye changes.
Your pending armor changes are not displayed because your outfit is toggled on.
These changes will cost %num1% transmutation charge[s].
Select an equipment slot to view available transmutation options for this profession. To view all weapon and armor skins, speak with a banker in any major city.
Unlocking will destroy the consumable and require a transmutation charge to apply to your item afterward. Are you sure you want to unlock %str1%?
You can't apply a skin to an empty slot.

Inflict blindness on foes you burn.
This trait can only affect the same enemy once per interval.
Increase healing to other allies. Water-weapon skills gain reduced recharge.
Gain quickness when you knock back or launch a foe.
Retaliation increases your chances to critically strike and grants might each interval.
Blocking an attack grants aegis to nearby allies.
Your Virtue of Resolve passive also regenerates endurance.
This tool will remove the upgrades from any item, without destroying either the upgrade or the item.
Gain bonus healing power when interrupting a foe.
Your passive life-force generation from nearby deaths is increased. Kills grant <c=@abilitytype>carapace</c>.

A percentage of your condition damage heals you.
Healing will not occur while life force replaces health.

Used to mine all metals. Unlimited uses.

Has a small chance to reward a watchwork sprocket on each swing in addition to mining results.
You are healed for a percentage of outgoing critical-hit damage. This healing is increased while you are under the effects of fury.

Venom skills siphon life from struck foes. Gain stacks of Spider Venom while stealthed.
Siphoning can only occur once per strike.
Help Shining Blade Kimber defeat Kol Skullsmasher.
Befriend the ogre camp so they will join you as allies.
Complete the Citadel of Flame in Story Mode.
Find the splendid chest in Rebel's Seclusion.

Complete Twilight Arbor in Story Mode.
Defeat Ulgoth the Modniir and his minions.
Find and defeat Sharky the Destroyer in Arca Lake of the Harathi Hinterlands.
Find and defeat Captain Jayne in the Brigantine Isles of Gendarran Fields.
Befriend the hylek camp so they will join you as allies.
Find the grand chest in the windy cave.
Defeat the fire shaman and his minions.
Complete the story step Forging the Pact.""
Complete the Crucible of Eternity in Story Mode.
Find the grand chest near Scholar Fryxx.
Kill the grawl shamans attempting a summoning ritual at the Tail of the Star God, in the Blazeridge Steppes.
Defeat Victurus the Shattered and his army.
Earn 100%% completion in the Fields of Ruin.
Find and defeat the Giant Blood Ooze in the Challdar Gorges of Bloodtide Coast.
Befriend the dredge camp so they will join you as allies.
Complete Sorrow's Embrace in Story Mode.
Complete the Obsidian Sanctum jumping puzzle.
Complete the story step The Battle of Fort Trinity.""
Find the locked door at the end of the forgotten stream.
Defeat the Risen Priest of Melandru.
Help Legionnaire Boneflayer crush the renegades in Thunderbreak Hills of the Fields of Ruin.
Find the grand chest in Provernic Crypt.
Find and defeat Gargantula, the spider broodmother of Wynchona Woods in Harathi Hinterlands.
Find and defeat the Krait Witch of Nonmoa Lake in Timberline Falls.
Find the chest in Verarium Delves.
Find the grand chest in Arundon Vale.
Complete the story step The Source of Orr.""
Complete Honor of the Waves in Story Mode.
Complete Caudecus's Manor in Story Mode.
Kill the Foulbear chieftain and her elite guards.
Find the hidden splendid chest within the Shattered Keep of Sparkfly Fen.
Find and defeat the Champion Ice Wurm in the Posternus Caverns of Lornar's Pass.
Find and defeat Lord Ignius the Eternal at Venison Pass within Lornar's Pass.
Defeat Vexa and her golem in Vexa's Lab.
Defeat the Infinity Coil Commander and capture the Infinity Coil.
Complete the Ruined City of Arah in Story Mode.
Defeat the Risen High Wizard and secure the Promenade of the Gods.
Defeat the Risen Priest of Grenth.
Find the grand chest in the Ship of Sorrows.
Burst skills have an increased chance to critically hit.
When you grant yourself might, grant it to nearby allies as well.
Exchange Transmutation Splitters for Transmutation Charges
It appears you have some unusable items. I can fix that for you.

Summon a fake treasure chest to crush your opponent. A minstrel will then appear from the chest and play for the deceased. 

This works in WvW and PvP.
This is a permanent account unlock.

Open these paper boxes to receive a flavorful fortune. You will also get 10 minutes of a random boost—Speed, Experience, Karma or Magic Find—with each fortune you open. Collect one to four fortune scraps per box for prizes, or a rare golden fortune" for an immediate prize."

Move in style with
a riding broom

Activate this broom to ride around in the world. Perfect for taking a spin around Tyria so long as you avoid enemies knocking you off it.  

This item has no movement speed bonus or additional skills.
This inventory toy summons a red lantern bundle which you can fly as you move around. Red lanterns cannot be used in combat.
Speak to this scout to reveal new renown hearts.

Salutations, The Durmand Priory, Vigil, and Order of Whispers have long reported on their daily struggles getting their troops safely across the harsh territory of Malchor's Leap. However, they recently sent word on your time in that area.
They tell us that you rose to this challenge, blazing your own trails to the undead lurking there. It seems you have helped solve many of those troop-transport challenges. Due to the historical significance of Orr, we at the Tyrian Explorers Society look upon your recent exploits with both admiration and envy. You are truly an inspiration to your peers. — Tyrian Explorers Society
There's an unexplored area in this direction.
Taking a Stand at Malchor's Leap
There's an unviewed vista in this direction.
Damage your foe by 1%% of their max health.
